docs.snippet: Why not go big with a cookout just a few days before July 4, and save the big day for hot dogs?

docs.snippet: Jesus Emmanuel Rodriguez Pichardo returned to Puerto Rico to photograph his old abandoned high school, which was one of many to close because of the island’s economic collapse.

headline.main: In Puerto Rico, Love Lingers for a Deserted School
